thread.title: dad of a young DJ and producer.
thread.title_full: Store DJ reviewed by dad of a young DJ and producer.

author: dad of a young DJ and producer.
title: dad of a young DJ and producer.
text: Never knew a quick visit to Store DJ to purchase a birthday present for my young son would later result into a life-changing experience for him. Not only did I get the best in-store advice on equipment 'eva', but also personalised advice and support for my son to start a musical journey. Not even a month later my 13YO son now has a quality international deephouse track release completed, an interview on radio and a birthday at the St Kilda music festival he will never forget. This all started when I walked into Store DJ (Richmond) to grab a pair of headphones - and without knowing struck up a conversation with a living legend having 30 years experience as a DJ, producer, and engineer - who took an interest and made a huge impact on a young man's life. I'll never purchase equipment from anywhere else again or rely only on reviews as I had to date - expert advice from those who know - really matters. You should walk into Store-DJ today and say hello - great things happen.
